option.morphclient.allowClientView.name: Display SelfView at client side if supported
option.morphclient.animationTime.descrip: Defines how long should the entering animation take (in ms)
option.morphclient.animationTime.name: (Debug) Animation duration
option.morphclient.changeCameraHeight.na: Change camera height to match current disguise
option.morphclient.scrollSpeed.name: Disguise list scrolling speed
option.morphclient.scrollSpeed.descripti: Sets the scroll speed for the disguise list
option.morphclient.previewInInventory.na: Always show disguise preview in inventory
option.morphclient.easing.name: (Debug) Animation easing
option.morphclient.easing.description: For more information, please check https://easings.net
option.morphclient.verbosePackets.name: (Debug) Log packets
text.morphclient.error.update_disguise1: Error occurred while updating disguise at client side.
text.morphclient.error.update_disguise2: SelfView has been disabled until the current disguise has been changed!
